hint.en: If the notication is activated this is the earliest it will notify about cost. If the limit is exceeded earlier it will not notify until it has reached these many minutes into the hour.
hint.no: Dersom varsling er aktivert er dette det tidligste den vil varsle om kostnad. Dersom grensen overstiges tidligere vil den ikke varsle fÃ¸r dette antallet minutter inn i timen.
